resources.string: The module has not been activated. Click to activate
Active display/SystemUI (OP7Pro) not added click Add (requires tai chi Magisk)
Pick up the phone to show is turned on
Please enable pick up the phone to show
pick up the phone to show is not open, please go to the system settings to open the pick up to show
Although the function of this module is not a pick up ambient display, but the system settings of this option must be turned on, otherwise the function will not work
7pro users strongly recommend opening the “touch screen to show” at the same time for a better experience(6T can also try）

Pay attention to the number of times of the screen and the last time of the screen. If the number of times and time of the screen does not change with the screen open/close, the module does not work properly. If this is caused by a module update, try re-hooking the module and restarting the screen. Or check if the storage permission is granted, and the system raises the hand to open the screen.
Storage permissions are not granted. A lot of features will be wrong!
PureMusic / FlatMusic mode has been tested to support lyrics display, other modes are not supported. Remember: not all themes support all the settings and features.
Force Restart Ambient Display, Root required (not 7Pro)
Force Restart SystemUi and Ambient Display, Root required (7Pro)
A Memo will be displayed when AOD is enabled
Get system Weather APP data by CP, displayed on the screen information, and the data follow the system Weather App.
Upside down mobile phone or in the pocket automatic screen off (7Pro slow response）
DO NOT AOD when NightMode is on
When this option is on, NightMode ON -> Aod OFF. When this option is off, NightMode has nothing to do with AOD
Force Word Clock on Flat theme

Replace previous sleep mode. After the mobile phone is flipped or put into the pocket, the screen that is always on is automatically turned off, and the mobile phone can be restored by turning it back or taking out the pocket. Avoid unnecessary screen light. Tested on the Pro, recommended to be enabled
What is the clock alignment setting

In the always-on mode, there is often a time mismatch, so you need to perform some operations to align the time, but different alignment schemes have different power consumption.\nHere you can choose your favorite alignment scheme.\n** Remarks: Only available in constant light mode
Just updating the time through the system\'s broadcast is suitable for broadcasting accurate OOS, but there will be a delay in HOS.\n** Note: the most power saving
Click to set system broadcast mode

In addition to the system broadcast, the AlarmManager is used to wake up. This method will synchronize the time every one minute, but it will also affect the sleep state of the mobile phone.\n** Remarks: There is power consumption, and wake up will be suspended after turning off the screen (this state saves power), so it is recommended to turn off the button or turn off the screen when not in use
Use AlarmManager-TimeOut mode to wake up (default)
Use AlarmManager fixed time task to wake up and synchronize once a minute. After a period of self-test, the effect is good now
Use the Chore mechanism to wake up

Another way is to use an animated clock to wake up, which can achieve the most accurate time synchronization, but it will affect the power consumption of the phone, and it may also be inaccurate when the phone enters deep sleep.\n** Note: There is power consumption, and the wake-up will be suspended after the flip-off screen is turned off (this state saves power), so it is recommended to flip the screen or turn off the screen when not in use
Show the always on display when raised. Only tested on the 7 Pro. Not guaranteed to be the same as the system AoD when raised option.
Turn on Chinese translation for AOD screen lyrics (sometimes it is useless)
Flip phone over or put in pocket to turn off display: %1s
Adjust brightness using light sensor in AOD to save power
Show sensitive information on the AOD

When locked, some people don\'t like information being displayed on their screen, to avoid unnecessary embarrassment. With this enabled, only the title of sensitive notifications will be shown as a reminder
On phones with an in-screen fingerprint sensor, the music display conflicts with the fingerprint sensor location. With this enabled, the music shifts up to avoid the sensor.
Turn off the screen after 1 hour
For use if you want this
Screen will turn off after 10 minutes
Screen will not turn off after 10 minutes
Automatically turn the screen off after 15 seconds of bright screen (not recommended - buggy)

Some people only need to check their notifications, so this function is provided, which is used in conjunction with the hand detection function. (The priority of this setting is higher than the setting of 10 minutes, and the effect will only appear in 10 minutes when the screen is not turned off in 15 seconds)
Screen will turn off after 15 seconds
Screen will not turn off after 15 seconds
Force Use English on Word Theme
Here you can control the phone\'s AOD mode, which is set to either system enhanced mode or constant light mode

The optimization is based on the original OnePlus screen, and the bottom of the screen shows the music being played by the system. The information screen notification interface has been optimized, which is more beautiful than before, and added a beating animation of the new notification.
Click to use system enhanced mode
7 Pro does not support system enhanced mode
The system enhanced mode is set successfully

I stole the screen from OnePlus and replaced it with a completely rewritten screen interface. Optimized the power consumption and anti-burn screen of the main interface, and optimized the notification display of the main interface.
New features:
1. Support notification stay, the last notification received will be left on the main screen of the interest screen in the form of small print, more convenient to see and avoid missed notifications
2. Comprehensive animation effects, the arrival of new notifications, and the change in the process of notification residency has a smooth animation display
3. Music screen, the concert played by the system is displayed on the screen
4. Sleep mode, enable sleep mode during sleep to avoid the trouble of constantly bright screen
5. Low power consumption, although it is not close to the screen, but there is no background task in the whole, the screen is in a low power consumption state
Other matters: This mode is still under development, and some bugs may be provided for free during testing!
Always On Display Mode <- Use This
Click to use Always On Display
Always On: The constant light mode is set successfully
## Tips -> Tai Chi Magisk Operating Environment Requirements: \nRequires Tai Chi App-> 5.0.2 and above Tai Chi Magisk plug-in version 4.7.5 (see group for download) or above\nEdXposed will also work
The module has been activated\nReinstall or upgrade the APP, it is recommended to check again and click the bottom to restart the display
The module has not been activated. Please activate the module in Tai Chi Magisk
Actively show that APP has been added\nFor the first time, you need to click below to force restart
Active display APP is not added Click to add active display APP\nRequires Tai Chi · Magisk
Set the AOD screen mode: System mode / Always on mode\nCurrent mode: %1s
Custom settings for Always ON mode\nFlip the screen, hide sensitive information, etc.

This is a function of screen music reminder. The interface effect is similar to that of Google Pixel\'s Now Playing, but it is essentially showing that the system is playing. To use this function, you need to add the music app you use to the list of TaiChi apps.

Currently testing NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music, RetroMusic [Translator note: Spotify, YouTube Music, Play Music work], but in theory there is no compatibility issue. Remember to add your own music app to TaiChi and kill and restart.
NetEase Cloud Music needs to turn on the system lock screen mode in the music lock screen, and other software can not be used for the same reason.
Click here to help you join NetEase Cloud and QQ Music~
These are apps already in TaiChi

When we use the constant light mode of the breathing screen, there are times when we don\'t want it to be always bright, such as when sleeping. When the sleep mode is turned on, the constant light mode will only last 5-10 seconds and then turn off the screen, and vice versa.
This module can only be used on the official Android P of OnePlus, other systems will roll over, this is a cliff-like dialog. Forcible use of bugs should be your own responsibility, without feedback.
Active display / SystemUI (OP7Pro) has been added
TaiChi is not installed or the version is lower than 4.3.4
Note: If EdXposed works by itself, please ignore the above tips
The number of times this plugin replaced the always on display is %1s\nLast screen off time: %2s
The number of times the plug-in replaced the always on display is 0\nLast screen off time: %1s\nIf this is not just after restarting the phone, there may be a problem
Return to the old settings interface (not recommended)
Like this mod? Donate to the developers
%1s\nWeather service is not enabled. You can enable it in the always on display settings
Failed to get the weather data. Check whether the system weather app is available.\nWeather automatically disabled
QQ is not installed or version is not supported
An error occurred, root may not be granted
Query success: PID %1s has been restarted. Click the button to restart again
No PID found. Your phone may not be OnePlus. If it is, please contact the developer.
Custom Settings, fixes, mod and translation by Kieron Quinn / Quinny899 @ XDA. All options not guaranteed to work on all devices and configurations.
Use a 24 hour clock on the AoD
Show AM/PM text when using 12 hour (looks pretty broken)
Show bullet point symbols • between the date and weather and weather city (if enabled) and alarm
Show an icon before the weather condition text in the form of an emoji (eg. ☁️)
Show the weather condition as text (eg. Cloudy)
Show the current temperature (unit can be changed in the OnePlus weather app)
Show the current weather city from the auto location (shows on a second line)
Show the next alarm after the weather. Only shows alarms within the next 24h (shows on a second line)
Show alarm emoji before the next alarm time
Use the system music controller listener, which may be more reliable when using TaiChi. Requires AOD music display to be enabled.
Use the music icon from the Pixel always on display (animated, may be buggy)
Show the AoD only when the device is raised. Only tested on the 7 Pro, and is not guaranteed to work the same as the system option
Set the text that will be displayed below the clock on supported layouts
Disable Ambient Display when Night Mode is enabled
Enable this to not show the AoD when the system Night Mode is enabled. Take notice of this setting, it\'s often the cause of incorrect issue reports!
Enable this setting to always use English text on the \'Word\' theme, regardless of the device language
Turn off the screen when device is flipped over or in your pocket. To save power, it\'s recommended to enable this.
Automatically adjust the brightness of the AoD to save power
Hide sensitive notification content, such as messages, on the AoD
Use the Google Sans font on the lockscreen. Disable to use the system font.
Hide the AoD after 10 minutes of inactivity
Turn off the AoD after 15 seconds. This is best used with raise detection, for people who just want to check their notifications. Has a higher priority than the 10 minutes option.
Leave blank for no text to be displayed
Use the Word Clock on the Flat Theme
Use a 24 hour clock on the AoD
Show AM/PM text when using 12 hour (looks pretty broken)
Show the next alarm after the weather. Only shows alarms within the next 24h
Use the system music controller listener, which may be more reliable
Use the music icon from the Pixel always on display (animated, may be buggy)
Move the music display up to avoid the in-display fingerprint sensor, for devices that have one.
For better compatibility, it\'s recommended that you add your music apps to TaiChi. Tap here to view the currently added apps and add more.

%1s - %2s - %3s
Today's temperature range: %4s

To change the location or unit, tap to launch the OnePlus Weather app
Weather information is not available. The weather functionality of the AoD will not work. Please check that you have the OnePlus Weather app installed and enabled
Show an icon before the weather condition text
Show the weather condition as text (eg. Cloudy)
Show the current temperature (unit can be changed in the OnePlus Weather app)
Show the current weather city from the auto location
If the clock does not update correctly on your AoD, you can change the mode of sync here.

These settings allow you to pick from four options to change the balance between clock accuracy on the always on display and power consumption. If you notice the clock on the AoD isn\'t updating as it should do, try changing to a different synchronization setting\n\nPlease note this is an advanced option, don\'t touch it if you don\'t understand what it does
This option relies on just the system broadcast of time updates. It is fairly accurate, but does have problems, especially on HydrogenOS. This uses the least amount of power.

This option uses the android Alarm Manager system in addition to the system broadcast. This allows for more accurate updates every minute, at the expense of a higher power consumption. If you use this option, it\'s recommended to use one of the options to turn the screen off after some time.
This option uses the Alarm Manager, but uses a \'fixed time task\' to wake up and synchronize once a minute. This is the most balanced of the options.

This option uses an animated clock to wake up, which provides a very accurate time synchronization, at the expense of power. It may also be inaccurate when the phone enters deep sleep. If you use this option, it\'s recommended to use one of the options to turn the screen off after some time.
Change the layout, theme and options for how the module looks and works
TaiChi or EdXposed are not installed
Module is not enabled in TaiChi
Module is not enabled in EdXposed
You must enable the system \"Pick up your phone to show\" setting for this module to work correctly. Tap to go to the settings to enable it.
The system \"Pick up your phone to show\" setting is enabled.
The storage permission must be granted to store global settings on your device. Tap to grant it.
The always on display has not been hooked yet. If this issue persists, try following the Troubleshooting steps in the \'Help\' section below.\n\nTap for debug info
Module working as expected. Tap for debug info.
Ambient Display was just restarted. Please try using the AoD now. If this message doesn\'t go away, try following the Troubleshooting steps in the \'Help\' section below.\n\nTap for debug info

Try one or more of the following steps:
- Make sure the module is enabled in TaiChi or EdXposed
- Make sure you have followed the required setup above
- Restart Ambient Display
- Reboot your device
- Rehook the module (disable and then re-enable it in TaiChi or EdXposed), then reboot
Join the official Telegram 🌍 or QQ 🇨🇳 groups
Created by RetroX and Kieron Quinn (Quinny898/Quinny899). Icon by Amadeo.
Like this module? Donate the original developer (RetroX) via AliPay or to the maintainer (Kieron Quinn) via PayPal
Running mode: %1s\nNumber of times the mod has replaced the system screensaver: %1s\nLast screen off time: %1s
System Enhancement - 7 Pro is not supported
Lucayunxiao & RetroX 🇨🇳, Gregor Wünsch 🇩🇪, Igor Nechiporenko / jimmy123322 🇷🇺, Joaquin Benincasa (español)🇦🇷, Kieron Quinn 🇬🇧
Tweak options that make the battery last longer when the AoD is in use
Forcibly enable doze when the AoD is showing.\nWarning: This might cause problems with notifications or alarms working when the AoD is showing, and is not fully tested
Enable the system battery saver when the AoD is showing.\nWarning: This may cause apps to be killed unexpectedly when the screen is off
Lower the refresh rate to 60Hz when the AoD is showing on devices that support it
Always use the lowest brightness when the AoD is visible, regardless of the light sensor.\nNote: This overrides the auto brightness setting in the General Settings
Pick the style of the weather condition icon
Show alarm icon before the next alarm time
This theme does not support these options. Please choose a different theme if you wish to use them
Show song lyrics on the AoD.\nNote: These lyrics are provided by QQ and NetEase, and have limited song support. You may see some Chinese text with this option enabled.
Use a smaller, more compact music layout similar to that seen on newer Pixels. The music info is displayed below the clock instead at the bottom of the screen.
Hide the horizontal divider between the clock, text and notifications
Show a bullet point symbol • as a divider between the date and weather text
Set which apps should have their content hidden as sensitive
